locationSection.intro: EDIFICIO NEPTUNO 3 is strategically situated in Centro Torrevieja, the vibrant heart of this Mediterranean gem. This prime location offers the perfect balance of urban convenience and coastal lifestyle, placing residents within moments of world-class amenities, pristine beaches, and thriving expat communities. Torrevieja Centro is characterized by its walkable streets, excellent infrastructure, and concentration of essential services including the prestigious Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja available 24/7 for peace of mind. The area attracts international buyers seeking authentic Spanish living with English-speaking support systems, quality healthcare, diverse dining options, and immediate access to the stunning Blue Flag-certified Playa del Cura. Beyond the beach, residents enjoy proximity to championship golf courses, British supermarkets stocking familiar products, international schools, and a dynamic social scene that makes Torrevieja Spain's most popular expat destination.
